Package dillon.gameAPI.errors

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EngineSecurityError
    Fires when an error with the API's security module occurs.
    GeneralRuntimeException
    Occurs when a general runtime exception occurs.
    ImageNotFound
    This is a custom error that means that an image couldn't be found.
    NetworkingError
    Occurs when there is a problem connecting to or setting up a network.
    RenderingError Deprecated
